member.name: P:PowerPlanHandler.PowerOptionManager.PowerPlans
member.summary: List of all available power plans

member.name: M:PowerPlanHandler.PowerOptionManager.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a power option manager which exposes the available power plans and can change the current power plan

member.summary: Gets all power plans available to system

member.summary: Sets a given PowerPlan to active

member.summary: Sets a given PowerPlan to active by its name ignoring character cases

member.name: M:PowerPlanHandler.PowerOptionManager.GetActivePlan
member.summary: Returns the name of the active power plan

member.name: M:PowerPlanHandler.PowerOptionManager.SetActive(System.Guid)
member.summary: Activates the GUID that matches a power plan

member.name: T:PowerPlanHandler.PowerOptionManager.PowerPlan
member.summary: Represents a power plan, access the plan by its name

member.name: P:PowerPlanHandler.PowerOptionManager.PowerPlan.Name
member.summary: Power plan's name as it's known to the system
